body_html:
Not for a "program in any desired language" (you want a generic AST for that) but use caffe protobuf DSL for creating artificial neuronal networks:
http://caffe.berkeleyvision.org/model_zoo.html
https://github.com/ethereon/caffe-tensorflow
https://github.com/pannous/tensor-caffe

body:
Not for a "program in any desired language" (you want a [generic AST](https://github.com/pannous/kast) for that) but use caffe protobuf DSL for creating artificial neuronal networks:
http://caffe.berkeleyvision.org/model_zoo.html
https://github.com/ethereon/caffe-tensorflow
https://github.com/pannous/tensor-caffe
